channel.title: Choosing peertube instance for Whonix videos
channel.description:
Just found these 4 are most useful to have an Whonix account on, but dunno which one particularly i should choose: (though i am mostly with the first one)
- https://tube.22decembre.eu/about/instance - https://peertube.servebeer.com/about/instance - https://sikke.fi/about/instance - https://pe.ertu.be/about/instance

item.title: Choosing peertube instance for Whonix videos
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
i was aiming for 22decembre , but his owner is seems to be dead as i dont receive any email authentication and i emailed him but no respond.

Our channel now is:

https://sikke.fi/accounts/whonix/videos

Read full topic
item.source: Choosing peertube instance for Whonix videos
